amendment.description: An amendment numbered 54 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit the Department of Energy from using funds to implement, administer, or enforce its rule regarding Room Air Conditioners.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
